name: Hard "The Ranch": Part Eight Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: According to Joanne in "It Ain't My Fault", what was in the Jim Beam bottle in her and Beau's shower?
questions.explanation:
Conditioner.

	After Nick beat Mary up and left her in his trailer, Luke brought Mary back to the ranch. Joanne offered her the use of their shower. She told Mary the gun held shampoo and the Jim Beam bottle had conditioner in it.

questions.text: What holiday did Beau, Luke and Colt spend at the ranch eating Hungry Man TV dinners in "Like's It's The Last Time"?
questions.explanation:
Thanksgiving.

	Luke's TV dinner had Colt's extra beans but no cobbler while Colt had no beans and Luke's cobbler. Beau's dinner was untouched. While Colt was on the porch bringing Peyton and Abby inside, Luke divided Colt's cobbler between him and Beau.

questions.text: In "Out Of Sight", how did Colt get stuck out in the freezing cold at the ranch?
questions.correct: Truck pinned him to the fence
options: He fell and hit his head
He became stuck under a piece of machinery
His truck stalled and it was too far to walk home
questions.explanation:
Truck pinned him to the fence.

	Colt was out doing his work and Luke's work. His truck backed into him and pinned him between it and the fence. The temperature dropped and he began hallucinating.

questions.text: When Colt hallucinated hearing Rooster talking to him through the phone in "Fadeaway", Rooster said he was in the hot tub with Gandhi, Haggard and who else?
questions.explanation:
Earnhardt.

	Colt hallucinated that Rooster was talking to him in Siri's voice. Colt then dictated a letter to Abby in case he didn't live. Abby found it after she and Luke got Colt to the hospital. She gave Colt the divorce papers back and told her she wanted to work things out.

questions.text: While playing with Peyton in the living room in "Born To Love", Colt told Abby he knew who killed Mary's ex, Nick.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Colt told her he knew who killed Nick and if she wanted the person's name he would tell her. Abby told him she didn't want to know who killed Nick. Colt didn't want any more secrets between them.

questions.text: Maggie returned in "Not Everything's About You". Where did she tell the family she was moving to permanently?
questions.explanation:
Florida.

	Maggie showed up at the ranch and told everyone she was selling her bar, her Airstream, and the cabin and moving permanently to Florida. She was living in a village with a group of people and the woman she cared about. The village helped take care of Maggie and her sister when her sister was sick with cancer.

questions.text: Why did Heather confess to the Bennetts that she killed her mother's ex-husband, Nick, in "What Was I Thinking?"
questions.explanation:
Luke was arrested.

	Luke was arrested for killing Nick because the police found his gun close to the cabin and it was used to kill Nick. Heather confessed to the family and Colt backed up her confession. Heather went to confess to the police, but Mary beat her to it. Mary had a better chance of getting a lesser charge for Nick's murder because he had abused her and gotten her hooked on heroin.

questions.text: What was the name of the former Army buddy that came to Iron River to see Luke in "Helluva Life"?
questions.explanation:
Koosh.

	Koosh was from Cleveland, but made Colt believe he was from the Middle East. Koosh was there to offer Luke a job working on cars with him in Chicago. Luke turned it down because he liked working the ranch with Colt.

questions.text: Suffering from a cold in "Dumb Effin' Luck", what did Colt tell Abby is 'God's cough syrup'?
questions.explanation:
Coors.

	Colt found a twelve pack of Coors in the refrigerator and told Abby they needed more because he was coming down with a cold and Coors was 'God's cough syrup'. Abby ignored him.

questions.text: What did Beau give Colt as a Christmas present in the series finale, "Take Me Home, Country Roads"?
questions.explanation:
Walt Disney World tickets.

	After returning from Neumann's Hill, Colt and Beau sat in the living room and gave out Christmas presents. Beau gave Colt tickets to Disney World and told him the entire family was going. Colt gave his father the keys to Iron River and told Beau that he gave Lisa Neumann his herd in exchange for the Iron River ranch.
